creator: slavko_h@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 27412
two screenshots mentioned in Description

Similar issue#40371 was "fixed" in 2007.

Initially “Pattern to Test” area displays its content as expected (see attached YH1129).

Steps to reproduce:
1. Update fields (use copy/paste) and navigate to another Respond Assertion;
2. repeat step#1 few times;

AR: the field does not display its content improperly (see attached YH128).

Work Around: reload Jmeter.

I cannot reproduce this; perhaps it depends on the exact text in the box.

Please select the Response Assertion element, right-click and use Save Selection As to create a JMX file of the element and attach it here.

Once I having the issue again I will provide that content.
